comment.author: 14048277@N05
comment._content:
Detailed picture from the paintjob to the "Brug over de Moerdijk" Bridge over Moerdijk. At this job one employe got an accident.
Date picture unknown

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: translation: painting the Moerdijkbrug [Moerdijk bridge]. Detail photo of the painting of the bridge [text says: across the Moerdijk, in fact across the Hollands Diep near the village of Moerdijk]. In this work a employee of the firm v/d Putten from Utrecht got an accident
